alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 11 at 3:05PM MST until January 12 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Tohono O`odham Nation and South Central Pinal County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells
